raw_infobox.name: Paul Pierce
raw_infobox.caption: Pierce with the Boston Celtics in 2008
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA champion (2008)
* Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2008)
* 10× NBA All-Star (2002–2006, 2008–2012)
* All-NBA Second Team (2008)
* 3× All-NBA Third Team (2001, 2002, 2007)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (1998)
* NBA Three-Point Contest champion (2010)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* No. 34 List of Boston Celtics accomplishments and records#Retired numbers
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (1998 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* First-team List of All-Big 12 Conference men's basketball teams (1998)
* Third-team All-Big 12 (1997)
* 2× Big 12 men's basketball tournament (1997 Big 12 men's basketball tournament, 1998 Big 12 men's basketball tournament)
* No. 34 jersey Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball#Retired jerseys
* McDonald's All-American Game (1995 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
* Second-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (1995)
* California Mr. Basketball (1995)
